categories: Category:Alliance to Restore the Republic starship classes

nodes.text: The Mansk-class light escort frigate was a starship manufactured by the Tallaani Shipyards in the Tapani sector. The Mansk-class was used by the Alliance to Restore the Republic during the Galactic Civil War, and were also known to be used as pirate vessels, as was the case with the Knifes Edge.
